SA11bsa003_u:3: SBca_1.1 sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyādarato 'khilāṃśca vandyān /
SA11bsa003_u:5: SBca_1.2 na hi kiṃcidapūrvamatra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgrathanakauśalaṃ mamāsti /
SA11bsa003_u:6: ata eva na me parārthacintā svamano vāsayituṃ kṛtaṃ mayedam //
SA11bsa003_u:7: SBca_1.3 mama tāvadanena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:10: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:11: SBca_1.5 rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyut kṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam /

SA11bsa003_u:13: SBca_1.6 tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram /
SA11bsa003_u:14: tajjīyate 'nyena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
SA11bsa003_u:18: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmair na vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam //
SA11bsa003_u:19: SBca_1.9 bhavacārakabandhano varākaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena /
SA11bsa003_u:25: SBca_1.12 kadalīva phalaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyat kuśalaṃ hi sarvameva /
SA11bsa003_u:26: satataṃ phalati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva tu bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:27: SBca_1.13 kṛtvāpi pāpāni sudāruṇāni yadāśrayāduttarati kṣaṇena /
SA11bsa003_u:33: SBca_1.16 gantukāmasya gantuśca yathā bhedaḥ pratīyate /
SA11bsa003_u:49: SBca_1.24 teṣāmeva ca sattvānāṃ svārthe 'pyeṣa manorathaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:61: SBca_1.30 nāśayatyapi saṃmohaṃ sādhustena samaḥ kutaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:62: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:63: SBca_1.31 kṛte yaḥ pratikurvīta so 'pi tāvatpraśasyate /
SA11bsa003_u:69: SBca_1.34 iti sattrapatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ sve hṛdaye karoti yaśca /
SA11bsa003_u:70: kaluṣodayasaṃkhyayā sa kalpān narakeṣvāvasatīti nātha āha //
SA11bsa003_u:71: SBca_1.35 atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ phalam /
SA11bsa003_u:72: mahatā hi balena pāpakaṃ jinaputreṣu śubhaṃ tvayatnataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:73: SBca_1.36 teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi namaskaromi yatroditaṃ tadvaracittaratnam /
SA11bsa003_u:75: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittānuśaṃsāvivaraṇaṃ nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:78: SBca_2.1 taccittaratnagrahaṇāya samyak pūjāṃ karomyeṣa tathāgatānām /
SA11bsa003_u:79: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalasya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇodadhīnām //
SA11bsa003_u:80: SBca_2.2 yāvanti puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yāni santi /
SA11bsa003_u:81: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi //
SA11bsa003_u:84: SBca_2.4 devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:86: SBca_2.5 akṛṣṭajātāni ca śasyajātāny anyāni vā pūjyavibhūṣaṇāni /
SA11bsa003_u:88: SBca_2.6 ādāya buddhyā munipuṃgavebhyo niryātayāmyeṣa saputrakebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:90: SBca_2.7 apuṇyavānasmi mahādaridraḥ pūjārthamanyanmama nāsti kiṃcit /
SA11bsa003_u:91: ato mamārthāya parārthacittā gṛhṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā //
SA11bsa003_u:92: SBca_2.8 dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:93: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā //
SA11bsa003_u:94: SBca_2.9 parigraheṇāsmi bhavatkṛtena nirbhīrbhave sattvahitaṃ karomi /
SA11bsa003_u:95: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:99: snānaṃ karomyeṣa tathāgatānāṃ tadātmajānāṃ ca sagītivādyam //
SA11bsa003_u:101: tataḥ suraktāni sudhūpitāni dadāmi tebhyo varacīvarāṇi //
SA11bsa003_u:109: bhojyaiśca khādyairvividhaiśca peyais tebhyo nivedyaṃ ca nivedayāmi //
SA11bsa003_u:111: gandhopalipteṣu ca kuṭṭimeṣu kirāmi puṣpaprakarān manojñān //
SA11bsa003_u:116: SBca_2.20 ataḥ paraṃ pratiṣṭhantāṃ pūjāmeghā manoramāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:122: SBca_2.23 svarāṅgasāgaraiḥ stotraiḥ staumi cāhaṃ guṇodadhīn /
SA11bsa003_u:128: SBca_2.26 buddhaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ yāvadā bodhimaṇḍataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:132: SBca_2.28 anādimati saṃsāre janmanyatraiva vā punaḥ /

SA11bsa003_u:136: SBca_2.30 ratnatraye 'pakāro yo mātapitṛṣu vā mayā /

SA11bsa003_u:160: SBca_2.42 yamadūtairgṛhītasya kuto bandhuḥ kutaḥ suhṛt /

SA11bsa003_u:170: SBca_2.47 trāṇaśūnyā diśo dṛṣṭvā punaḥ saṃmohamāgataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:171: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye //
SA11bsa003_u:172: SBca_2.48 adyaiva śaraṇaṃ yāmi jagannāthān mahābalān /
SA11bsa003_u:179: viraumyārtaravaṃ bhītaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pāpinam //
SA11bsa003_u:180: SBca_2.52 āryamākāśagarbhaṃ ca kṣitigarbhaṃ ca bhāvataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:182: SBca_2.53 yaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃtrastāḥ palāyante caturdiśam /
SA11bsa003_u:185: śaraṇaṃ yāmi vo bhīto bhayaṃ nāśayata drutam //
SA11bsa003_u:188: SBca_2.56 ekenāpi yataḥ sarve jambudvīpagatā narāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:189: naśyanti yeṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadikṣu na labhyate //
SA11bsa003_u:194: SBca_2.59 adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yuktā me sukhāsikā /
SA11bsa003_u:195: avaśyameti sā velā na bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ yadā //
SA11bsa003_u:196: SBca_2.60 abhayaṃ kena me dattaṃ niḥsariṣyāmi vā katham /
SA11bsa003_u:197: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthitaṃ manaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:201: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:202: SBca_2.63 iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātriṃdivaṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:209: na bhadrakamidaṃ nāthā na kartavyaṃ punarmayā //
SA11bsa003_u:210: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ pāpadeśanā nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:219: SBca_3.4 sarvāsu dikṣu saṃbuddhān prārthayāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:223: SBca_3.6 evaṃ sarvamidaṃ kṛtvā yanmayāsāditaṃ śubham /
SA11bsa003_u:225: SBca_3.7 glānānāmasmi bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /
SA11bsa003_u:229: SBca_3.9 daridrāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nidhiḥ syāmahamakṣayaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:233: SBca_3.11 sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇārthi ca me manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:234: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyatām //
SA11bsa003_u:236: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃsubhiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:237: SBca_3.13 krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
SA11bsa003_u:239: SBca_3.14 kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa003_u:241: SBca_3.15 yeṣāṃ kruddhāprasannā vā māmālambya matirbhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:242: teṣāṃ sa eva hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye //
SA11bsa003_u:243: SBca_3.16 abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:246: pārepsūnāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca //
SA11bsa003_u:258: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣiṣyāmi yathākramam //
SA11bsa003_u:259: SBca_3.24 evaṃ gṛhītvā matimān bodhicittaṃ prasādataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:261: SBca_3.25 adya me saphalaṃ janma sulabdho mānuṣo bhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:277: SBca_3.33 jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā /
SA11bsa003_u:279: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittaparigraho nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:282: SBca_4.1 evaṃ gṛhītvā sudṛḍhaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinātmajaḥ /

SA11bsa003_u:289: etāṃ sarvāṃ visaṃvādya kā gatirme bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa003_u:290: SBca_4.5 manasā cintayitvāpi yo na dadyātpunarnaraḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:294: SBca_4.7 vetti sarvajña evaitāmacintyāṃ karmaṇo gatim /

SA11bsa003_u:310: SBca_4.15 kadā tathāgatotpādaṃ śraddhāṃ mānuṣyameva ca /
SA11bsa003_u:312: SBca_4.16 ārogyaṃ divasaṃ cedaṃ sabhaktaṃ nirupadravam /
SA11bsa003_u:316: SBca_4.18 yadā kuśalayogyo 'pi kuśalaṃ na karomyaham /
SA11bsa003_u:324: SBca_4.22 na ca tanmātramevāsau vedayitvā vimucyate /
SA11bsa003_u:326: SBca_4.23 nātaḥ parā vañcanāsti na ca moho 'styataḥ paraḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:327: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya nābhyastaṃ kuśalaṃ mayā //
SA11bsa003_u:328: SBca_4.24 yadi caivaṃ vimṛṣyāmi punaḥ sīdāmi mohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:330: SBca_4.25 ciraṃ dhakṣyati me kāyaṃ nārakāgniḥ suduḥsahaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:333: jānannapi ca nīye 'haṃ tāneva narakān punaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:334: SBca_4.27 atra me cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:335: na jāne kena muhyāmi ko 'trāntarmama tiṣṭhati //
SA11bsa003_u:337: na śūrā na ca te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto 'smi taiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:338: SBca_4.29 maccittāvasthitā eva ghnanti māmeva susthitāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:340: SBca_4.30 sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syurmama śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:343: kṣaṇāt kṣipanti māṃ tatra balinaḥ kleśaśatravaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:346: SBca_4.33 sarve hitāya kalpante ānukūlyena sevitāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:349: hṛdaye nivasatsu nirbhayaṃ mama saṃsāraratiḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:351: mativeśmani lobhapañjare yadi tiṣṭhanti kutaḥ sukhaṃ mama //
SA11bsa003_u:352: SBca_4.36 tasmānna tāvadahamatra dhuraṃ kṣipāmi yāvanna śatrava ime nihatāḥ samakṣam /
SA11bsa003_u:353: svalpe 'pi tāvadapakāriṇi baddharoṣā mānonnatāstamanihatya na yānti nidrām //
SA11bsa003_u:357: bhavati mama viṣādadainyamadya vyasanaśatairapi kena hetunā vai //
SA11bsa003_u:359: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmānmama bādhakāni //
SA11bsa003_u:361: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārthaṃ na kathaṃ sahe 'ham //
SA11bsa003_u:366: SBca_4.43 atra grahī bhaviṣyāmi baddhavairaśca vigrahī /
SA11bsa003_u:368: SBca_4.44 galantvantrāṇi me kāmaṃ śiraḥ patatu nāma me /
SA11bsa003_u:370: SBca_4.45 nirvāsitasyāpi tu nāma śatrordeśāntare sthānaparigrahaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:371: yataḥ punaḥ saṃbhṛtaśaktireti na kleśaśatrorgatirīdṛśī tu //
SA11bsa003_u:372: SBca_4.46 kvāsau yāyānmanmanaḥstho nirastaḥ sthitvā yasmin madvadhārthaṃ yateta /
SA11bsa003_u:373: nodyogo me kevalaṃ mandabuddheḥ kleśāḥ prajñādṛṣṭisādhyā varākāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:374: na kleśā viṣayeṣu nendriyagaṇe nāpyantarāle sthitā
SA11bsa003_u:375: nāto 'nyatra kuha sthitāḥ punaramī mathnanti kṛtsnaṃ jagat /
SA11bsa003_u:378: SBca_4.48 evaṃ viniścitya karomi yatnaṃ yathoktaśikṣāpratipattihetoḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:383: SBca_5.1 śikṣāṃ rakṣitukāmena cittaṃ rakṣyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:384: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā //
SA11bsa003_u:385: SBca_5.2 adāntā mattamātaṅgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
SA11bsa003_u:389: SBca_5.4 vyāghrāḥ siṃhā gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:391: SBca_5.5 sarve baddhā bhavantyete cittasyaikasya bandhanāt /
SA11bsa003_u:392: cittasyaikasya damanāt sarve dāntā bhavanti ca //
SA11bsa003_u:395: SBca_5.7 śastrāṇi kena narake ghaṭitāni prayatnataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:396: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tāḥ striyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:403: SBca_5.11 matsyādayaḥ kva nīyantāṃ mārayeyaṃ yato na tān /
SA11bsa003_u:407: SBca_5.13 bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaścarma bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:409: SBca_5.14 bāhyā bhāvā mayā tadvacchakyā vārayituṃ na hi /
SA11bsa003_u:415: SBca_5.17 duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare /
SA11bsa003_u:417: SBca_5.18 tasmātsvadhiṣṭhitaṃ cittaṃ mayā kāryaṃ surakṣitam /
SA11bsa003_u:418: cittarakṣāvrataṃ mukttvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:423: SBca_5.21 anena hi vihāreṇa viharan durjaneṣvapi /
SA11bsa003_u:425: SBca_5.22 lābhā naśyantu me kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam /
SA11bsa003_u:426: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana //
SA11bsa003_u:428: smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca sarvayatnena rakṣata //
SA11bsa003_u:429: SBca_5.24 vyādhyākulo naro yadvanna kṣamaḥ sarvakarmasu /
SA11bsa003_u:430: tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu //
SA11bsa003_u:433: SBca_5.26 aneke śrutavanto 'pi śrāddhā yatnaparā api /
SA11bsa003_u:445: SBca_5.32 iti dhyātvā tathā tiṣṭhet trapādarabhayānvitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:447: SBca_5.33 saṃprajanyaṃ tadāyāti na ca yātyāgataṃ punaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:451: SBca_5.35 niṣphalā netravikṣepā na kartavyāḥ kadācana /
SA11bsa003_u:460: kathaṃ kāyaḥ sthita iti draṣṭavyaṃ punarantarā //
SA11bsa003_u:463: SBca_5.41 kutra me vartata iti pratyavekṣyaṃ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:467: SBca_5.43 yad buddhvā kartumārabdhaṃ tato 'nyanna vicintayet /
SA11bsa003_u:469: SBca_5.44 evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvamanyathā nobhayaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:475: SBca_5.47 yadā calitukāmaḥ syādvaktukāmo 'pi vā bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:477: SBca_5.48 anunītaṃ pratihataṃ yadā paśyetsvakaṃ manaḥ /

SA11bsa003_u:479: SBca_5.49 uddhataṃ sopahāsaṃ vā yadā mānamadānvitam /
SA11bsa003_u:480: sotprāsātiśayaṃ vakraṃ vañcakaṃ ca mano bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:487: SBca_5.53 asahiṣṇvalasaṃ bhītaṃ pragalbhaṃ mukharaṃ tathā /
SA11bsa003_u:489: SBca_5.54 evaṃ saṃkliṣṭamālokya niṣphalārambhi vā manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:497: SBca_5.58 cirātprāptaṃ kṣaṇavaraṃ smṛtvā smṛtvā muhurmuhuḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:503: SBca_5.61 na svīkaroṣi he mūḍha kāṣṭhaputtalakaṃ śucim /
SA11bsa003_u:509: SBca_5.64 evamanviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāramatra te /
SA11bsa003_u:511: SBca_5.65 na khāditavyamaśuci tvayā peyaṃ na śoṇitam /
SA11bsa003_u:515: SBca_5.67 evaṃ te rakṣataścāpi mṛtyurācchidya nirdayaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:516: kāyaṃ dāsyati gṛdhrebhyastadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:517: SBca_5.68 na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate /

SA11bsa003_u:519: SBca_5.69 datvāsmai vetanaṃ tasmātsvārthaṃ kuru mano 'dhunā /
SA11bsa003_u:520: na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate //

SA11bsa003_u:525: SBca_5.72 saśabdapātaṃ sahasā na pīṭhādīn vinikṣipet /
SA11bsa003_u:533: SBca_5.76 parokṣaṃ ca guṇān brūyādanubrūyācca toṣataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:535: SBca_5.77 sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittairapi durlabhā /
SA11bsa003_u:537: SBca_5.78 na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścitparatra ca mahatsukham /
SA11bsa003_u:545: SBca_5.82 dakṣa utthānasaṃpannaḥ svayaṃkārī sadā bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:557: SBca_5.88 dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet /
SA11bsa003_u:559: SBca_5.89 gambhīrodāramalpeṣu na strīṣu puruṣaṃ vinā /
SA11bsa003_u:561: SBca_5.90 nodāradharmapātraṃ ca hīne dharme niyojayet /
SA11bsa003_u:564: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam //
SA11bsa003_u:565: SBca_5.92 mukhapūraṃ na bhuñjīta saśabdaṃ prasṛtānanam /
SA11bsa003_u:568: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet //
SA11bsa003_u:577: SBca_5.98 rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet /
SA11bsa003_u:579: SBca_5.99 yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
SA11bsa003_u:580: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:581: SBca_5.100 na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:582: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:585: SBca_5.102 sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet /
SA11bsa003_u:589: SBca_5.104 śikṣāḥ sūtreṣu dṛśyante tasmātsūtrāṇi vācayet /
SA11bsa003_u:595: SBca_5.107 yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate /
SA11bsa003_u:599: SBca_5.109 kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:601: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ saṃprajanyarakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:606: SBca_6.2 na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:608: SBca_6.3 manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
SA11bsa003_u:609: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite //
SA11bsa003_u:612: SBca_6.5 suhṛdo 'pyudvijante 'smād dadāti na ca sevyate /
SA11bsa003_u:615: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
SA11bsa003_u:617: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām //
SA11bsa003_u:620: SBca_6.9 atyaniṣṭāgamenāpi na kṣobhyā muditā mayā /
SA11bsa003_u:622: SBca_6.10 yadyastyeva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11bsa003_u:623: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
SA11bsa003_u:630: SBca_6.14 na kiṃcidasti tadvastu yadabhyāsasya duṣkaram /
SA11bsa003_u:640: SBca_6.19 duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:641: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā //
SA11bsa003_u:643: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:646: SBca_6.22 pittādiṣu na me kopo mahāduḥkhakareṣvapi /
SA11bsa003_u:650: SBca_6.24 kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:651: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca //
SA11bsa003_u:652: SBca_6.25 ye kecidaparādhāśca pāpāni vividhāni ca /
SA11bsa003_u:653: sarvaṃ tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate //
SA11bsa003_u:654: SBca_6.26 na ca pratyayasāmagryā janayāmīti cetanā /
SA11bsa003_u:658: SBca_6.28 anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:662: SBca_6.30 yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
SA11bsa003_u:664: SBca_6.31 evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:666: SBca_6.32 vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa003_u:669: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:670: SBca_6.34 yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
SA11bsa003_u:679: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham //
SA11bsa003_u:681: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake //
SA11bsa003_u:684: SBca_6.41 mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
SA11bsa003_u:685: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam //
SA11bsa003_u:686: SBca_6.42 mayāpi pūrvaṃ sattvānāmīdṛśyeva vyathā kṛtā /
SA11bsa003_u:688: SBca_6.43 tacchastraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa003_u:689: tena śastraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa003_u:691: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa003_u:692: SBca_6.45 duḥkhaṃ necchāmi duḥkhasya hetumicchāmi bāliśaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:698: SBca_6.48 etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa003_u:702: SBca_6.50 bhavenmamāśayaguṇo na yāmi narakān yadi /
SA11bsa003_u:704: SBca_6.51 atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:709: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:710: SBca_6.54 mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:713: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam //
SA11bsa003_u:714: SBca_6.56 varamadyaiva me mṛtyurna mithyājīvitaṃ ciram /
SA11bsa003_u:716: SBca_6.57 svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:718: SBca_6.58 nanu (nūnaṃ?) nivartate saukhyaṃ dvayorapi vibuddhayoḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:720: SBca_6.59 labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa003_u:722: SBca_6.60 pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa003_u:723: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu //
SA11bsa003_u:724: SBca_6.61 yadarthameva jīvāmi tadeva yadi naśyati /
SA11bsa003_u:731: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā //
SA11bsa003_u:735: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:737: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam //
SA11bsa003_u:738: SBca_6.68 kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:740: SBca_6.69 evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa003_u:748: SBca_6.73 yadyetanmātramevādya duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ na pāryate /
SA11bsa003_u:751: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā //
SA11bsa003_u:752: SBca_6.75 na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:754: SBca_6.76 yadi prītisukhaṃ prāptamanyaiḥ stutvā guṇorjitam /
SA11bsa003_u:755: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:756: SBca_6.77 idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa003_u:758: SBca_6.78 tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa003_u:764: SBca_6.81 trailokyapūjyaṃ buddhatvaṃ sattvānāṃ kila vāñchasi /
SA11bsa003_u:766: SBca_6.82 puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:768: SBca_6.86 sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
SA11bsa003_u:770: SBca_6.84 yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
SA11bsa003_u:771: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim //
SA11bsa003_u:772: SBca_6.85 kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni prasannān svaguṇānatha /
SA11bsa003_u:773: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi //
SA11bsa003_u:774: SBca_6.86 na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
SA11bsa003_u:776: SBca_6.87 jātaṃ cedapriyaṃ śatrostvattuṣṭyā kiṃ punarbhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:778: SBca_6.88 atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
SA11bsa003_u:782: SBca_6.90 stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
SA11bsa003_u:783: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me //
SA11bsa003_u:787: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham //
SA11bsa003_u:788: SBca_6.93 yathā pāṃśugṛhe bhinne rodityārtaravaṃ śiśuḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:792: SBca_6.95 anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11bsa003_u:793: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:794: SBca_6.96 tatsukhena sukhitvaṃ cetsarvatraiva mamāstu tat /
SA11bsa003_u:798: SBca_6.98 stutyādayaśca me kṣemaṃ saṃvegaṃ nāśayantyamī /
SA11bsa003_u:799: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate //
SA11bsa003_u:803: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhāddveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama //
SA11bsa003_u:806: SBca_6.102 puṇyavighnaḥ kṛto 'nenetyatra kopo na yujyate /
SA11bsa003_u:810: SBca_6.104 yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:811: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate //
SA11bsa003_u:812: SBca_6.105 na hi kālopapannena dānavighnaḥ kṛto 'rthinā /
SA11bsa003_u:813: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate //
SA11bsa003_u:818: SBca_6.108 mayā cānena copāttaṃ tasmādetat kṣamāphalam /
SA11bsa003_u:820: SBca_6.109 kṣamāsiddhyāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:829: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:830: SBca_6.114 āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:831: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:837: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam //
SA11bsa003_u:842: SBca_6.120 bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:844: SBca_6.121 svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:845: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
SA11bsa003_u:846: SBca_6.122 yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11bsa003_u:848: SBca_6.123 ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān na sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
SA11bsa003_u:850: SBca_6.124 tasmānmayā yajjanaduḥkhadena duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamahākṛpāṇām /
SA11bsa003_u:852: SBca_6.125 ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyamupaimi loke /
SA11bsa003_u:853: kurvantu me mūrghni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:854: SBca_6.126 ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ / kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
SA11bsa003_u:855: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpās ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra //
SA11bsa003_u:860: SBca_6.129 yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
SA11bsa003_u:864: SBca_6.131 kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryādyena syānnarakavyathā /
SA11bsa003_u:872: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:875: SBca_7.1 evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
SA11bsa003_u:876: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:877: SBca_7.2 kiṃ vīryaṃ kuśalotsāhastadvipakṣaḥ ka ucyate /
SA11bsa003_u:886: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:895: SBca_7.11 jīvamatsya ivāsmīti yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te /
SA11bsa003_u:898: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
SA11bsa003_u:902: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:907: SBca_7.17 naivāvasādaḥ kartavyaḥ kuto me bodhirityataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:911: SBca_7.19 kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
SA11bsa003_u:913: SBca_7.20 athāpi hastapādādi dātavyamiti me bhayam /
SA11bsa003_u:917: SBca_7.22 idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam /
SA11bsa003_u:926: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram //
SA11bsa003_u:929: SBca_7.28 puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi /
SA11bsa003_u:930: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate //
SA11bsa003_u:933: SBca_7.30 evaṃ sukhātsukhaṃ gacchan ko viṣīdetsacetanaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:939: SBca_7.33 aprameyā mayā doṣā hantavyāḥ svaparātmanoḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:941: SBca_7.34 tatra doṣakṣayārambhe leśo 'pi mama nekṣyate /
SA11bsa003_u:945: SBca_7.36 guṇaleśe 'pi nābhyāso mama jātaḥ kadācana /
SA11bsa003_u:948: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā //
SA11bsa003_u:949: SBca_7.38 bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:953: SBca_7.40 kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau /
SA11bsa003_u:955: SBca_7.41 duḥkhāni daurmanasyāni bhayāni vividhāni ca /
SA11bsa003_u:957: SBca_7.42 manorathaḥ śubhakṛtāṃ yatra yatraiva gacchati /
SA11bsa003_u:959: SBca_7.43 pāpakārisukhecchā tu yatra yatraiva gacchati /
SA11bsa003_u:972: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam //
SA11bsa003_u:973: SBca_7.48 janmāntare 'pi so 'bhyāsaḥ pāpādduḥkhaṃ ca vardhate /
SA11bsa003_u:974: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam //
SA11bsa003_u:977: SBca_7.50 kleśasvatantro loko 'yaṃ na kṣamaḥ svārthasādhane /
SA11bsa003_u:979: SBca_7.51 nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati /
SA11bsa003_u:987: SBca_7.55 mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit /
SA11bsa003_u:989: SBca_7.56 ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:991: SBca_7.57 mānena durgatiṃ nītā mānuṣye 'pi hatotsavāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:994: te 'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:995: SBca_7.59 te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
SA11bsa003_u:996: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayaphalaṃ pratipādayanti //
SA11bsa003_u:999: SBca_7.61 mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate /
SA11bsa003_u:1000: evaṃ kṛcchramapi prāpya na kleśavaśago bhavet //
SA11bsa003_u:1003: SBca_7.63 sukhārthaṃ kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham /
SA11bsa003_u:1004: karmaiva tu sukhaṃ yasya niṣkarmā sa sukhī katham //
SA11bsa003_u:1009: SBca_7.66 balanāśānubandhe tu punaḥ kartuṃ parityajet /
SA11bsa003_u:1013: SBca_7.68 tatra khaḍgaṃ yathā bhraṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyātsabhayastvaran /
SA11bsa003_u:1015: SBca_7.69 viṣaṃ rūdhiramāsādya prasarpati yathā tanau /
SA11bsa003_u:1022: kathaṃ karomi yenedaṃ punarme na bhavediti //
SA11bsa003_u:1023: SBca_7.73 saṃsargaṃ karma vā prāptamicchedetena hetunā /
SA11bsa003_u:1029: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ vīryapāramitā nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:1036: SBca_8.3 snehānna tyajyate loko lābhādiṣu ca tṛṣṇayā /
SA11bsa003_u:1039: śamathaḥ prathamaṃ gaveṣaṇīyaḥ sa ca loke nirapekṣayābhiratyā //
SA11bsa003_u:1041: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:1042: SBca_8.6 apaśyannaratiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
SA11bsa003_u:1043: na ca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvavadbādhyate tṛṣā //
SA11bsa003_u:1048: SBca_8.9 bālaiḥ sabhāgacarito niyataṃ yāti durgatim /
SA11bsa003_u:1050: SBca_8.10 kṣaṇādbhavanti suhṛdo bhavanti ripavaḥ kṣaṇāt /
SA11bsa003_u:1052: SBca_8.11 hitamuktāḥ prakupyanti vārayanti ca māṃ hitāt /
SA11bsa003_u:1053: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim //
SA11bsa003_u:1064: SBca_8.17 lābhī ca satkṛtaścāhamicchanti bahavaśca mām /
SA11bsa003_u:1066: SBca_8.18 yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
SA11bsa003_u:1068: SBca_8.19 tasmātprājño na tāmicchedicchāto jāyate bhayam /
SA11bsa003_u:1071: saha lābhayaśobhiste na jñātāḥ kva gatā iti //
SA11bsa003_u:1072: SBca_8.21 māmevānye jugupsanti kiṃ prahṛṣyāmyahaṃ stutaḥ /
